job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: What We Are Looking For:We are growing the Clinical Insights team at DeepIntent. As a Data Scientist you will be working closely across DeepIntent Analytics teams located in New York City, India, and Bosnia. The role will support internal and external business partners in defining patient and provider audiences, and generating analyses and insights related to measurement of campaign outcomes, Rx, patient journey, and supporting evolution of DeepIntent product suite. Activities in this position include creating and scoring audiences, reading campaign results, analyzing medical claims, clinical, demographic and clickstream data, performing analysis and creating actionable insights, summarizing, and presenting results and recommended actions to internal stakeholders and external clients, as needed.Â Â Key Responsibilities:Support business development and client analytics and insights process, utilizing consumer demographic, clickstream, and clinical data (claims and medications)Utilizing ML for modeling claims and media datasolutionsStructuring and setting up automated reports to measure performanceAnalyzing campaigns and use cases, including deep dive into demographic, digital, clinical, and behavioral drivers of patients and providersExtract, explore, visualize, and analyze longitudinal healthcare (claims, Rx etc.), consumer demographic, mobile and clickstream data using SQL, Python or RUtilize ML, API infrastructure, and cloud environmentsSupport internal product development of data tools, dashboards, and forecasts, as neededÂ Â Who You Are:Understanding of the ad-tech / digital marketing and advertising data and campaigns, and aptitude for learning the healthcare data: pharma,Â  medical claims, provider data, Rx etcDesire to work in a rapidly growing and scaling startup, with a strong culture of fast-paced cross functional collaborationHands-on predictive modeling experience (decision tree, boosting algorithms and regression models)Orientation and interest in translating complex quantitative results into meaningful findingsHypothesis oriented curiosity and tenacity in obtaining meaningful results through iterative data analysis and data prepâCan doâ attitude, outstanding technical troubleshooting and problem-solving abilities, aptitude to rapidly develop working knowledge of new tools, open-source libraries, data sources etc.Â Ability to meet deadlines and flexibility to work constructively
